document.text:
UNITED STATES 
DISTRICT COURT 
SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF 
NEW YORK 
JANE 
DOE 
Plaintiff, 
v. 
DARREN INDYKE, et al., 
Defendants. 
DECLARATION OF 
No. 20 Civ. 484 (JGK) (DCF) 
declares under penalty of perjury pursuant to 28 U.S.C. ยง 
1746 
as 
follows: 
I. I submit this declaration in 
response to a subpoena dated June 10, 2020, from the 
plaintiff in this action, directing me to produce documents and appear for a deposition. I 
understand this declaration is being submitted in lieu of appearing for a deposition. 
2. Beginning in 1991, I  worked as a pilot for Mr. Jeffrey Epstein ("Epstein") and 
Epstein
-affiliated entities. 
3. Through flying for Mr. Epstein, I  met Ms. . I do not 
recall when or 
where specifically I 
met Ms. 
for the first time, or the first flight she was on, but it was 
likely in the mid to 
late 1990s. 
4. I  have attached as Exhibit A my flight logs from the time period between January 
1, 1994 and 
December 31, 1997. I  made these records at or near the time of the flights reflected 
therein, they reflect my knowledge at that time, and it was my practice to regularly make such 
records during the 1994-1997 time period. With respect to the names in the 
"Remarks, 
EFTA00031984

Procedures, Maneuvers, Endorsements" column, my general practice 
during this time was to use 
this column to record the number of passengers on the 
plane. If I  knew the passenger's name or 
had learned that name during the course of 
the trip, my general practice was to record that name. 
If I did not know or learn the name, I would write down a generic description, for example, 
"Baby," "Nanny," "1 Male," "1 Female." 
5. The first time the name M' appears in my flight logs between 
January 1, 
1994 and December 31, 1997 is on November 11, 1996. This 
entry reflects that a no 
last name, was on a flight on that date from West Palm Beach, Florida, to Teterboro Airport in 
New Jersey. 
6. 
also appears in an entry on May 9, 1997. This entry reflects that a 
`=' no 
last name, was on a flight on that date from Teterboro Airport to Santa Fe, New 
Mexico. 
7. I  have no specific recollection of either of these flights, 
which occurred over 23 
years ago. In addition to Ms. =, I 
recall one other individual with the first name `=" 
who flew on Mr. Esptein's planes, although my recollection is that this other a did not 
begin flying until 
the early 2000s. 
8. I declare under penalty 
of perjury that the foregoing is true and correct to the best 
of 
my recollection. 
Executed on July )1 , 2020
